name: Wing Commander: Academy
description: Installs the GOG DosBox version of Wing Commander: Academy.
notes:
In case there is no sound edit /app/dosbox_academy.conf:
midiconfig=128:0

files.assets: N/A:Please provide an archive containing the Star Wars: Rebel Assault GOG installer

content:
files:
- assets: 'N/A:Please provide an archive containing the Star Wars: Rebel Assault GOG
    installer'
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/app/dosbox_academy.conf
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/app/WCA.EXE
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: assets
